ai-tha-ap63:2.3_0: Awakened as a fully awakened Buddha,
ai-tha-ap63:2.4_0: I frequented by all the world.
ai-tha-ap63:3.2_0: King Pajjota is the hermitage of kings.
ai-tha-ap63:3.3_0: They’ve gone forth through their own hard work,
ai-tha-ap63:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap63:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap63:6.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap63:6.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap63:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sāgata.
ai-tha-ap63:8.1_0: First: he was a well-known senior,
